DailyVerse.title: Verse of the Day
DailyVerse.share_description: Select one of the following social networks to share the verse of the day.
DailyVerse.subscribe_description: Receive the verse of the day directly in your email.

DownloadApp.title: Read, Listen, and Pray Anywhere
DownloadApp.description: Take the Bible with you wherever you go. Download the free app.

ReadingPlans.title: Reading Plans and Devotionals
ReadingPlans.description: Grow in your faith with plans that fit your life.
ReadingPlans.plan_deleted_desc: You have removed the plan "{planTitle}" from your saved plans.
ReadingPlans.link_copied_desc: The link to the plan has been copied to the clipboard.
ReadingPlans.plan_1_description: Explore the life and teachings of Jesus in this 30-day plan.
ReadingPlans.plan_2_title: Proverbs: A Daily Dose of Wisdom
ReadingPlans.plan_2_description: Gain practical wisdom for daily life with one chapter of Proverbs each day.
ReadingPlans.plan_3_description: Follow the grand narrative of the Bible from Genesis to Revelation.
ReadingPlans.plan_4_description: Daily readings: Old Testament + New Testament (1–3 chapters a day).
ReadingPlans.plan_5_description: Order events as they occurred historically.
ReadingPlans.plan_6_description: Strengthen your relationship with Jesus and your understanding of His ministry.
ReadingPlans.plan_7_description: Each month a theme: Faith, Prayer, The Holy Spirit, The Church, Wisdom, Evangelism.
ReadingPlans.plan_8_description: One psalm a day. Perfect for strengthening prayer and worship.
ReadingPlans.plan_9_description: An excellent pace for new believers or study groups. Daily reading: 3 chapters.
ReadingPlans.plan_10_description: Deep but achievable reading. Very useful for leadership and discipleship.
ReadingPlans.plan_11_title: The Whole Bible with Jesus at the Center Plan
ReadingPlans.plan_11_description: A Christ-centered plan. Readings that connect directly with the work of Christ.
ReadingPlans.plan_12_description: This 10-day plan guides you through key passages from the Old and New Testaments to strengthen your relationship with God, renew your mind, and deepen your spiritual life. Through the Gospels, Psalms, Proverbs, Acts, and the apostolic letters, you will experience a balanced journey that combines teaching, wisdom, worship, and practical growth in Christ. It is a perfect plan to restart your devotional life, start a new habit, or share with your family or study group.

RegisterInvitation.title: Join Our Community
RegisterInvitation.description: Register to save your progress, create your own reading plans, and connect with other members.
RegisterInvitation.registration_success_desc: Welcome! Your account has been created.
